channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- gradle-plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-5720|2024-01-23T01:30:30.953Z -- n%2Fa -- gradle-plugin
item.description: A flaw was found in Quarkus, where it does not properly sanitize artifacts created using the Gradle plugin, allowing certain build system information to remain. This flaw allows an attacker to access potentially sensitive information from the build system within the application.
